steps.dialogue: Look at the top line. One half is marked there. Now look at the bottom line with sixths.
steps.prompt: Place three sixths on the bottom line.

workspace.description: Reference number line from 0 to 1 with point and label at 1/2
Number line from 0 to 1 with tick marks at sixths, endpoints labeled

correct_answer.context: Three sixths lands at the same position as one half on the top line, showing they are equivalent fractions

steps.success_path_dialogue: Right there. Three sixths lands at the same point as one half.
